Body: Possible Duplicate:  Why are some apps on the market incompatible with my device?  I've been trying to Draw Something on my Samsung Galaxy Mini GT S5570, but it says "device not compatible". Why is this? I thought this was quite a modern phone.
Title: Cannot install Draw Something on Galaxy Mini GT S5570

history.Text: Ive been trying to install the draw something game on my samsung galaxy mini GT S5570 but it says device not compatible. why is this? i thought this was quite a modern fone
draw something application & galaxy mini GT S5570
